.. note:: This model does not exist in Inspire, since it is used to manage the holdings (paper and electronic) held by the Library
description: JSON data model for the holdings of the books, proceedings, standards, theses and reports in CDS.

description.description: :MARC: In BibCirculation field ``description`` or for electronic holding: 0247__q or ``8564_y``
description.title: Holding description

library.description:
:MARC: No Marc - BibCirculation field ``library``
.. Note:: list should come from the list of Libraries registered in the system.
library.title: Holding library

number_of_pages.title: Number of pages of the document

schema.description:
:MARC: ``0247_2``
Currently, the following identifiers are recognized:
* `HDL <http://handle.net>`_
* `URN
  <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform_Resource_Name>`_
.. note::
    DOIs should be put into :ref:`hep.json#/properties/dois`, not here.
    Although ISBNs can also be mapped to a URN (by
    prepending ``urn:isbn:`` to the ISBN), they should
    be put in the :ref:`hep.json#/properties/isbns` field instead.
schema.title: Type of identifier

value.description:
:MARC: ``0247_a``
This value gets interpreted as an identfier of the type
specified by :ref:`schema`.
:example: ``10138/168995`` (when :ref:`schema` = ``HDL``)
:example: ``urn:nbn:de:hebis:77-diss-1000009520`` (when
    :ref:`schema` = ``URN``)
value.title: Persistent identifier

urls.description:
:MARC: ``8564``
URLs to external resources related to this record.
.. note::
    Links to internal CDS resources are found in another element.

visible.description:
:MARC: Does not exist in MARC
Used to hide records that should not be made visible in the collection.

title: A record in the Literature collection
